AbandonedChild47.title: Bambino abbandonato
AbandonedChild47.desc: NAME era un(a) bambino(a) solare e vivace. Un giorno, HE si allontano' dai suoi ricchi genitori naturali, e venne definitivamente ritenuto(a) scomparso(a) in un magazzino minerario presumibilmente in disuso. Grazie alle tecniche di clonazione, i suoi genitori decisero che, piuttosto che a cercarlo, avrebbero impiegato meglio il tempo a clonare semplicemente un figlio migliore.

AbandonedChild60.title: Bambino abbandonato
AbandonedChild60.desc: NAME nacque debole di salute. I genitori pensarono che HE potesse solo essere un peso per la tribù, e lo abbandonarono a sé stesso... Oggi, NAME è ancora vivo.

AbandonedOrphan61.title: Orfano
AbandonedOrphan61.desc: Abbandonato alla nascita, NAME ha da sempre vissuto in un orfanotrofio. Da piccola canaglia, HE è diventat{PAWN_gender ? o:a} un furbo mascalzone./desc>

Abductee43.title: Abductee
Abductee43.desc: NAME was abducted by xenohumans when HE was still a baby. They experimented on HIM to understand his genetic structure.\n\nAs HE grew up, NAME grew a little bit too big and strong for his captors and eventually escaped.

AcademyStudent80.title: Academy student
AcademyStudent80.desc: NAME went to school like a good space cadet would. He was very tall and was known for his good looks.\n\nThough he worried more about his hairstyle than his grades, he still somehow passed the final exams.

AccursedChild81.title: Accursed child
AccursedChild81.desc: NAME was born at the peak of a lunar eclipse. The elders declared HIM a child of darkness brought HIM under their care.\n\nHISCAP entire childhood was spent studying the lore and rituals of HIS people - until the day of calling.

AceFighterPilot38.title: Asso dell'aviazione
AceFighterPilot38.desc: NAME si laureo' con onore alla Star Academy e si distinse come un'asso nel pilotare caccia in tre campagne contro aggressori culturalmente piu' avanzati. Tuttavia, dopo una feroce battaglia, si ritrovo' bloccato e la sua portaerei fu distrutta. Non sapendo piu' dove andare, entro' nella sua capsula di salvataggio e prego'.

AcolyteOfStars63.title: Acolyte of stars
AcolyteOfStars63.desc: Ever the dreamer, NAME traveled across the universe to find the thing he felt was calling to him.\n\nHECAP became poorer and poorer, but used every means possible to carry on.

Actor42.title: Attore
Actor42.desc: NAME ha attraversato il suo mondo natale con una compagnia itinerante di attori, recitando in teatri affollati e deliziando il pubblico ovunque. HECAP era un(a) perfezionista e creava i propri costumi ed accessori piuttosto che usare quelli che gli venivano dati.

AddictionCounsel60.title: Addiction counsel
AddictionCounsel60.desc: After recovering from a joywire addiction, NAME adopted a non-violent way of life and vowed to help others.\n\nTravelling between communities, HE used medicine, arts, and crafts to aid others who struggled with their own addictions.

Adventurer19.title: Adventurer
Adventurer19.desc: NAME's thirst for adventure took HIM to many planets. HECAP visited the brightest glitterworlds and the darkest war-torn toxic planets in HIS quest to find novelty and excitement.\n\nHECAP worked as little as possible, often skirting ethical boundaries to make a quick buck. Among all jobs, HE hated cooking the most.

AdventuringChild56.title: Adventuring child
AdventuringChild56.desc: Axle was raised to become an engineer. For years, he planned to stow away on a cargo ship and start a new, more adventuresome life.\n\nOne night, after his parents fell asleep, he managed to sneak on board a cargo ship just before it left port.

AdventurousYouth79.title: Adventurous youth
AdventurousYouth79.desc: NAME explored all around HIS family's large estate, uncovering little natural wonders hidden in nearby catacombs, rivers, and caves.\n\nDuring his teenage years, NAME made numerous enemies

AerospaceEngineer44.title: Ingegnere aerospaziale
AerospaceEngineer44.desc: NAME era un ingegnere responsabile della produzione di aeromobili e navi spaziali. HECAP si dedico' sul miglioramento delle linee di produzione, e divenne noto(a) per la sua padronanza su questioni tecniche e scientifiche.

AIProgrammer5.title: Programmatore di IA
AIProgrammer5.desc: Michael si arruolo' nella divisione robotica militare, sviluppando IA da combattimento piu' intelligenti. In tutto il tempo che trascorse la', lui non parlo' mai con nessun altro umano. Passo' tutto il suo tempo a parlare con le IA che stava sviluppando.

AIResearcher30.title: Ricercatore di IA
AIResearcher30.desc: Dave era un rinomato ricercatore in intelligenza artificiale, robotica e olografia interattiva. Le sue amicizie con le menti artificiali che creava gli hanno dato la fiducia per interagire con le persone reali, ed e' ben presto diventato esperto nella comunicazione personale.

AlcoholicTrucker58.title: Camionista alcolizzato
AlcoholicTrucker58.desc: NAME era un camionista spaziale che lavorava per le Industrie Arcknight quando uccise moglie e figlia in un incidente. Il suo corpo venne riparato con una terapia nano-genetica sperimentale. Ora i suoi muscoli si rigenerano e si induriscono continuamente, ed ogni movimento strappa di nuovo il tessuto. Sopporta il dolore in silenzio.

AmateurAstronomer86.title: Amateur astronomer
AmateurAstronomer86.desc: NAME was fascinated with astronomy. HECAP would spend hours gazing at planets and nebulae through his telescope.\n\nHECAP is credited with discovering a small comet that would, years later, strike a nearby moon and disrupt the mining operations there.

AmateurBotanist14.title: Amateur botanist
AmateurBotanist14.desc: Spending many summers crawling through dirt, Christian found he had quite the green thumb. Instead of learning to cook the food he grew, he just grew more and more.

AmateurEngineer34.title: Ingegnere dilettante
AmateurEngineer34.desc: NAME crebbe in una famiglia con un'impostazione militare e tecnica. HECAP voleva unirsi all'esercito ma a suo padre non piaceva l'idea, quindi il suo interesse si rivolse a grandi macchine volanti ed opere di ingegneria. HECAP sperava segretamente che questo lo(a) avrebbe condotto(a) un giorno ad una vita di esplorazione galattica.

ApocalypseChild57.title: Apocalypse child
ApocalypseChild57.desc: NAME spent his childhood on a post-apocalyptic world. He fought for survival from a young age, on a planet where trust did not exist.\n\nHe told everyone that he had no luck.

ApocalypseSurvivor23.title: Sopravvissuto all'apocalisse
ApocalypseSurvivor23.desc: NAME nacque durante una fase travagliata del suo pianeta natale, dal momento che i cambiamenti climatici minacciavano carestie ed inondazioni di massa. Mentre cresceva la situazione si aggravava - milioni di persone morirono e stati pacifici caddero nell'anarchia. NAME ed i suoi genitori fecero di tutto per sopravvivere.

ApprenticeSmith42.title: Apprentice smith
ApprenticeSmith42.desc:
NAME grew up helping in his father's smithy.

They were some of the last smiths on the planet that to use traditional smithing methods. They even collect some materials themselves.

Sometimes, after work, NAME would practice using the swords HE forged.

Architect28.title: Architetto
Architect28.desc: NAME ha progettato e costruito edifici. Nella sua casa su un Mondo Splendente, la maggior parte degli aspetti tecnici dell'architettura erano gestiti da una IA. Questo gli ha permesso di spingere i limiti artistici del mestiere, ma ha anche comportato che HE non si sia mai sporcato(a) le mani sui cantieri.

ArchotechSpy40.title: Archotech spy
ArchotechSpy40.desc: NAME was a cybernetic researcher. Studying a transcended world, HE became too involved with HIS subjects. Over time, the archotech machine core recruited HIM into its service, and used HIM as a spy.\n\nWhen HE later rebelled against HIS non-human master, it sent mechanoids across space to hunt HIM down.

ArmyCook51.title: Cuoco soldato
ArmyCook51.desc: Ben si uni' all'esercito come lavoratore e trascorse la maggior parte del suo tempo a cucinare ed a fare riparazioni. Mentre era di stanza su un pianeta pericoloso, lui si sottopose ad un addestramento basilare di tiro e di sopravvivenza.

ArmyScientist35.title: Scienziato dell'esercito
ArmyScientist35.desc: NAME faceva ricerche scientifiche per un esercito planetario. HECAP ha studiato gli scenari di guerra e progettato sistemi bellici per aiutare a vincere le battaglie con il minimo sforzo.

ArtfulDodger87.title: Abile furbacchione
ArtfulDodger87.desc: Robin e' cresciuto in una delle Ecumenopoli ed ha dovuto badare a se' stesso per tutta la vita. Non si e' mai fidato di nessuno, affidandosi alla sua persuasione ed astuzia per sopravvivere. Presto divenne abile con armi da fuoco e coltelli tanto quanto con le parole.

ArtificerRampant24.title: Artificer rampant
ArtificerRampant24.desc: Fuelled by the thrill of discovery and his own megalomania, NAME set out to invent new devices and improve existing ones, breaking laws and customs as necessary.\n\nHECAP formed a crew to gather materials for HIS work - and to deal with outsiders who might interfere.

ArtisanFarmer23.title: Artigiano contadino
ArtisanFarmer23.desc: NAME crebbe nella sua fattoria di famiglia su un mondo splendente. Erano tra gli ultimi contadini sul pianeta ad aver preferito metodi di agricoltura tradizionali alle tecnologie avanzate.

AsceticPriest11.title: Monaco asceta
AsceticPriest11.desc: Dopo aver fatto un voto di silenzio, NAME si e' unito(a) ad un monastero su tranquillo pianeta acquatico per trascorrere i suoi giorni in una serena contemplazione. HECAP trovo' la felicita' facendo crescere ortaggi nel giardino e producendo formaggi nelle cantine del monastero.

AspergersRebel66.title: Aspergers rebel
AspergersRebel66.desc: NAME grew up as a rebel on an formerly-advanced rimworld devastated by war.\n\nHISCAP Aspergers syndrome meant he struggled with social situations and was incapable of caring, but HE learned hard skills like research and shooting very quickly.

AspiringEngineer58.title: Aspiring engineer
AspiringEngineer58.desc: NAME had a fascination with gadgets and gizmos. HECAP took apart and put together almost anything HE could find.\n\nHECAP got used to repairing toys brought to HIM by other children, and even fixed a few devices from HIS elders.

AspiringPopIdol61.title: Aspirante idolo pop
AspiringPopIdol61.desc: Min era stata istruita nel canto e nella danza per diventare il prossimo grande idolo pop. Lei e' cresciuta venendo accudita dai suoi manager. Lei non ha mai conosciuto il lavoro manuale, ma ha imparato molto sulla musica e sul galateo.

Assassin16.title: Killer
Assassin16.desc: Robin ricevette un addestramento specialistico come agente operativo in omicidi ad alto rischio. La sua abilita' con il fucile era ineguagliabile. Alla fine venne tradito dai suoi superiori quando un obiettivo venne a sapere delle cosa e si offri' di finanziare i loro progetti futuri. Robin giuro' di non fidarsi mai piu' di nessuno.

Assassin20.title: Assassino
Assassin20.desc: NAME era un killer professionista. HECAP ha tratto profitto dalla sua freddezza e capacita' di calcolo. Nel suo mestiere, la totale mancanza di empatia era un vantaggio.

Athlete23.title: Athlete
Athlete23.desc: NAME was professional athlete at early age. Thanks to her skills, she was able to leave her homeworld and enroll in a glitterworld university of science and technology.\n\nBecause of her demanding schedule and introverted nature, she became socially inept.

AwkwardNerd12.title: Nerd disadattato
AwkwardNerd12.desc: Sempre affascinato dalle macchine, Dave ha trascorso il suo tempo a studiare robotica e olografia. Preferiva la compagnia delle sue creazioni scientifiche a quella di altre persone.

AWOLSoldier20.title: AWOL soldier
AWOLSoldier20.desc: NAME was an infantryman.\n\nWhen HE was informed of his assignment to the Xennoa-Zartza War, HE decided HE did not want to be a soldier. He was able to escape via military spacejet.

BanditLeader36.title: Leader criminale
BanditLeader36.desc: NAME scalo' i ranghi dell'organizzazione criminale, diventando infine il(la) leader di una delle loro piu' remote cellule criminali. Il suo cane Rest rimase sempre al suo fianco.

BanishedSoldier76.title: Fuorilegge
BanishedSoldier76.desc: NAME divenne lo schiavo fisicamente piu' minaccioso, avendo passato il suo poco tempo libero a scolpire il suo corpo in maniera ossessiva. I suoi sforzi vennero infine ripagati quando il padrone gli offri' un posto come guardia del corpo personale. In seguito, quando tramo' sfruttando la sua posizione per uccidere il padrone e liberare gli schiavi, venne scoperto e riusci' a malapena a mettersi in salvo.

Bartender55.title: Barista
Bartender55.desc: NAME ha lavorato come barista in una squallida stazione spaziale. Il lavoro consisteva di una parte di creazione cocktail, una parte di diplomazia ed una parte di teste spaccate.

BattlefieldTech75.title: Battlefield tech
BattlefieldTech75.desc: NAME had received firearms training, but HIS work was focused on technical adaption and manipulation of combat mechanoids on the battlefield.\n\nHECAP developed PTSD after narrowly escaping a primitive firebomb attack in a wheat field. The army medically discharged him from service.

BattleMechanic27.title: Battle mechanic
BattleMechanic27.desc: NAME was a tech-obsessed mercenary in an early fusion-era system.\n\nHECAP was unusually obsessed with gathering the right gear, and often customized HIS own equipment with original modifications.

BeastSlayer67.title: Beast slayer
BeastSlayer67.desc: NAME traveled between planets, following news of animal attacks. HECAP would camp on the planet for weeks, learning about HIS prey before striking. HECAP most enjoyed hunting thrumbos.\n\nPreferring to work alone, NAME enjoyed the thrill of the hunt, and the meat from the kill.

BehaviourResearch74.title: Behaviour research
BehaviourResearch74.desc: Captured as a feral child, NAME was forced into the ways of modern society. HECAP quickly adapted and became a behavioural researcher, eventually owning a private facility.\n\nHECAP specialized in canines, but learned a great deal about all animals. HECAP never had interest in plants, however.

BiosphereManager95.title: Responsabile della biosfera
BiosphereManager95.desc: NAME viveva in un tranquillo mondo avanzato in cui tutti i compiti secondari erano svolti da robot e dove le persone si dedicavano al tempo libero. HECAP ha organizzato la fauna e la flora di un esteso parco dove i cittadini venivano per ammirare la bellezza della natura.

BlackjackPlayer86.title: Blackjack player
BlackjackPlayer86.desc: The only useful skill NAME learned from his tough military school was card counting. He amassed many enemies by cheating at casinos, becoming ever more edgy and violent as the threat of retaliation grew.\n\nWhen he was finally caught, they burned half his skin off. He'll never be able to face fire or violence again.

Blacksmith72.title: Blacksmith
Blacksmith72.desc: As a blacksmith on a medieval world, NAME gained a reputation for the high quality of HIS work. HECAP wasn't bad at using the swords HE forged either.

BlacksmithShooter35.title: Blacksmith shooter
BlacksmithShooter35.desc: As a young blacksmith, NAME's family shop was raided by the police. HECAP shot two officers before they knocked him out and arrested him.\n\nSentenced to life in prison, NAME learned about traveling and raiding from other criminals.

BlacksmithsSon39.title: Blacksmith's son
BlacksmithsSon39.desc: NAME's father owned the blacksmith shop in an run-down old city district. NAME would help his father whenever he could.\n\nLater, HIS father took him as a blacksmith's apprentice and raised him as a man. NAME also to on shooting as a hobby.

BlessedChild46.title: Blessed child
BlessedChild46.desc: NAME was born under auspicious circumstances to a midworld spiritual group and held in reverence throughout HIS childhood.\n\nHECAP learned to take care of the poor and give succor to the faithful from an early age.

BloodgameSurvivor29.title: Bloodgame survivor
BloodgameSurvivor29.desc: NAME was sold to the Corestars Entertainment Company and used as meat in one of the company's system-wide broadcast shows.\n \nHISCAP manipulative nature made HIM quite a nightmare, even to the audience. He was kicked out and exiled to a planet full of deadly animals, criminals and armed camera-drones.

BloodyDentist9.title: Bloody dentist
BloodyDentist9.desc: After studying at a famous college, NAME's weak personality eventually snapped under the strain of angry administrators and whining patients. HECAP went on a secret murder spree, killing many of those under HIS care.\n\nAfter a pursuit, HE managed to escape HIS planet and travel to a new world.

BloodyWanderer65.title: Bloody wanderer
BloodyWanderer65.desc: NAME was a wanderer, traveling from town to town, taking odd jobs and stealing to live.\n\nOne day, he had a mental break and went on a long rampage, destroying several towns and killing many. HECAP eventually calmed, but HIS bloodlust never left HIM.

Bodyguard26.title: Guardia del corpo
Bodyguard26.desc: NAME trovo' lavoro in un Mondo Medio, proteggendo chiunque pagasse abbastanza. HECAP acquisi' la padronanza di diversi stili di combattimento e divenne noto(a) per la sua spietatezza verso chiunque incrociasse la sua strada.

BodyguardTrainee54.title: Bodyguard trainee
BodyguardTrainee54.desc: NAME was born into a famously skilled family of bodyguards. HISCAP mothers Elena and Victoria forced HIM into many dangerous situations, training HIM to put HIS client's well-being over HIS own.\n\nNAME was taught about many herbs and natural poisons to help HIM prevent clients from being poisoned.

BoneCollector14.title: Bone collector
BoneCollector14.desc: Born to a family of fortune hunters, NAME always had a passion for ancient history.\n\nThough never a tough or social boy, HE loved to dig through history books as well as dirt piles.

Bookworm3.title: Bookworm
Bookworm3.desc: NAME spent his youth in the library, reading every book he could about the technical marvels of space travel, the engineering ingenuity of the space-faring pioneers, and the horrible yet fascinating tales of the mechanoid races. He vowed that one day, he would see these things for himself.

BountyHunter22.title: Bounty hunter
BountyHunter22.desc: NAME was a bounty hunter on a massive glitterworld. HECAP worked sensitive assignments for extremely wealthy clients, and was known for quiet execution and total discretion.

BoyScout11.title: Scout
BoyScout11.desc: NAME avait rejoint une troupe de scoutisme dans un monde commun.\n\nHECAP y appris de nombreux talents de survie, notamment comment survivre en ext�rieur et soigner des blessures simples.

BoySoldier14.title: Boy soldier
BoySoldier14.desc: War may never change - but the cast of characters does.\n\nBorn on a violent urbworld, NAME was trained from a young age to fight the wars of others, and became rather good at it.

Brigand68.title: Brigante
Brigand68.desc: NAME viaggiava con una banda di briganti che HE chiamava amici. HE aveva anche una nave di sua proprieta' - La Dung Mucker 2000.

BrothelGofer59.title: Brothel gofer
BrothelGofer59.desc: Born on a steam-powered midworld wracked by a century of economic crises, NAME went to work at a young age. Scrounging, shoe-polishing, sewing - he did it all. But HE was most known as a brothel gofer, delivering all manner of aphrodisiacs and chemicals to the girls' rooms.

BrutalThief89.title: Brutal thief
BrutalThief89.desc: Growing up in a gang, NAME learned the brutality of the streets.\n\nKnowing that showing weakness could be fatal, he closed himself of to others.

BushSniper94.title: Bush sniper
BushSniper94.desc: NAME's peaceful life was cut short when HIS country was brutally invaded.\n\nNAME was drafted into service as soon as HE was of legal age, and quickly showed an aptitude for rifles. HECAP spent months living in the forests picking off soldiers who dared cross the border.

BusinessGangster35.title: Uomo d'affari
BusinessGangster35.desc: Stando sempre un passo sopra la legge, NAME e' diventato un legittimo uomo d'affari ed ha messo a tacere chiunque osasse dire il contrario. Come proprietario di bordelli, bische e ristoranti, la fortuna di NAME e' proseguita mentre la sua concorrenza subiva una serie di sfortunati ed inspiegabili incidenti.

Cadet56.title: Cadet
Cadet56.desc: Born on the planet New China, NAME's father was a police chief and kept extremely strict watch over his son.\n\nNAME had to do military-style drill exercises every day and keep his room spotlessly clean, always ready for inspection. HECAP came to abhor violence.

CaravanChild91.title: Caravan child
CaravanChild91.desc: NAME was born on a urbworld merchant ship to an entrepreneurial mother and an absent father. Born male, she disliked boy stuff, and got into her mother�s things all the time.\n\nEventually, she traveled with her mother to a glitterworld and spent her savings on a body she was happy with.

Caravaneer53.title: Caravaneer
Caravaneer53.desc: NAME was the leader of a caravan. HECAP was responsible for the safety of HIS caravan and was the head negotiator in countless trade deals.\n\nHECAP and HIS people prospered, but their wealth made them a target for brigands. They often had to take up arms to fend off bandits and highwaymen.

CaravanTraveler6.title: Caravan traveler
CaravanTraveler6.desc: Born to a family of traveling merchants, NAME was mentored by HIS father in the ways of being a trader. HECAP was often tasked with caring for the pack animals. Due to HIS nomadic lifestyle, HE hunted and bartered for HIS food.

CargoPilot58.title: Pilota di cargo
CargoPilot58.desc: NAME venne cresciuto(a) da scaricatori su una grossa nave da carico mineraria. HECAP ha perfezionato le sue capacita' di commercio e manipolazione delle persone mentre trasportava armi tra i sistemi.

Castaway57.title: Castaway
Castaway57.desc: NAME was a passenger on a routine interstellar transit. When his ship was destroyed, he lived as a castaway on an uninhabited planet for several years.

CatHerder12.title: Custode dei gatti
CatHerder12.desc: NAME dava una mano nell'attivita' di allevamento di gatti di suo padre, socializzando, accudendo e nutrendo centinaia di gatti. Quando si rifiuto' di pulire i bisogni dei gatti, venne trasferito alla divisione scientifica dell'allevamento.

CaveChild30.title: Cave child
CaveChild30.desc: NAME grew up in a cave on an tundra planet, and was adopted by a traveling group of entertainers known only as the Wizards. Once a starfaring crew, the Wizards told HIM wondrous stories about the universe.\n\nOne day, the Wizards did not return from scavenging. After years of waiting, NAME set off into space to find them.

CaveTender66.title: Aiutante di famiglia
CaveTender66.desc: Mentre gli altri andavano a caccia o a raccogliere cibo, NAME preferiva rimanere a casa per cucinare e prendersi cura dei piu' piccoli e dei malati.

CaveworldTender20.title: Piccolo cavernicolo
CaveworldTender20.desc: NAME crebbe in un complesso di grotte posto sotto la superficie di un mondo inospitale. HECAP ha lavorato con gli altri bambini nella cura delle piantagioni di funghi della tribu'.

CaveworldTunneler48.title: Scavatore di tunnel
CaveworldTunneler48.desc: NAME ha lavorato nello scavo di tunnel in un immenso complesso di grotte sotterranee. HECAP conosce cosi' bene le rocce che puo' muoversi in una grotta affidandosi quasi esclusivamente al suo olfatto.

CharityWorker36.title: Filantropo
CharityWorker36.desc: I Mondi Splendenti sono dei paradisi di sicurezza e comodita' per coloro che sono sufficentemente fortunati da viverci, ma NAME non poteva ignorare i pianeti vicini dove la gente soffriva nella poverta'. HECAP ha trascorso la sua intera vita lavorativa raccogliendo donazioni ed aiutando i bisognosi.

Chemist54.title: Chemist
Chemist54.desc: NAME was a research chemist. HECAP worked with chemicals, from pharmaceuticals to explosives, to develop new substances and treatments.

ChessMaster24.title: Chess master
ChessMaster24.desc: NAME loved to play chess. HECAP even earned the nickname Bishop for some of HIS craftier moves. \n\nHECAP never got into trouble - mostly because he was good at not getting caught.

ChiefEngineer18.title: Chief engineer
ChiefEngineer18.desc: As chief engineer on board a large spaceship, NAME was an expert in all things fiddly and complex.\n\nShe relied on other members of the crew for some of the basic necessities of life. She and her ship eventually disappeared into a longsleep voyage of exploration.

ChildKnave90.title: Child-knave
ChildKnave90.desc: NAME was a child-knave of King Loteric. HECAP enjoyed the training with wooden sticks and engaging others in close combat. HECAP adapted quickly to the heat of battle and was good at spreading fire.\n\nHECAP served his lord well, until the king died in an unfortunate accident.

ChildOfDrifters28.title: Child of drifters
ChildOfDrifters28.desc: Ever since HE was very small, NAME had never known a home beyond HIS parent's ship. They were a family of nomads whose meandering provided a constant change of scenery. HISCAP life was often perilous but never dull, and HE inherited HIS parents' wanderlust at a young age.

ChildOfGlass61.title: Child of glass
ChildOfGlass61.desc: NAME was raised underground on a "marble" planet - a wasteland of radioactive asphalt and toxic fallout.\n\nTo survive on a planet devoid of life, HE had to learn how to farm underground and how to fight without wasting bullets.

ChildProdigy22.title: Child prodigy
ChildProdigy22.desc: After graduating college at age twelve, Jered devoted his life to becoming immortal. However his research crossed the line when he tried to modify his body using gene therapy and mechanical augmentation. He was arrested and condemned to a prison planet.

ChildSlave6.title: Child slave
ChildSlave6.desc: Graham was born to a poor family on a rimworld. His father sold him into slavery at a young age and he was traded many times. A tycoon bought him as part of a child labor force and sent down into mines to look after machines and to work alongside them.

ChildSpy53.title: Baby spia
ChildSpy53.desc: I bambini sono spesso ritenuti innocenti e possono essere ideali come spie. NAME venne addestrato(a) nell'arte dell'infiltrazione e della raccolta di informazioni gia' dall'eta' di nove anni. Gli anni trascorsi dietro le linee nemiche e la natura belligerante del suo mondo nativo hanno dato poche opportunita' alla sua educazione.

ChildStar74.title: Baby star
ChildStar74.desc: NAME era celebre in tutto il suo mondo nativo come attore bambino in film e spettacoli televisivi. La sua fama gli/le ha permesso di entrare in contatto con un grande numero di persone, ma ha anche interferito con la sua educazione.

CircusPerformer93.title: Circus performer
CircusPerformer93.desc: Growing up in the circus, NAME learned a lot of interesting things. More interesting then the balls he juggled were the pockets he picked between shows.\n\nA mistake with some firesticks made him develop a deathly fear of fire.

CivilEngineer23.title: Ingegnere civile
CivilEngineer23.desc: NAME era un ingegnere civile ben conosciuto. Il suo lavoro prevedeva la progettazione e la manutenzione di strutture fortificate di pietra. HECAP ha fatto abbastanza analisi statistiche da rendere la sua mente brillante.

CivilServant2.title: Impiegato di ufficio
CivilServant2.desc: NAME ha lavorato ai piu' bassi livelli dell'amministrazione per un moribondo governo burocratico. HECAP era spesso a casa a sbrigare complicate pratiche ed a giocare con la politica dell'ufficio.

ClanChief14.title: Clan chief
ClanChief14.desc: NAME managed a small criminal clan on an outlying trade hub world.

ClassClown73.title: Class clown
ClassClown73.desc: In the ultra-competitive environs of his glitterworld school, NAME always offered to play the class clown to diffuse tension.\n\nHECAP developed a sense of social desperation from this, as well as an appreciation for the artistic side of comedy.

CloneFarmed43.title: Clone-farmed
CloneFarmed43.desc: Clone children are seeded into organic-rich wombvats and rapidly grown in a simmed universe. They're harvested later, sometimes for food, sometimes for organs, sometimes for workers - but they're always called 'Disposable'.

CloneFarmer72.title: Clone farmer
CloneFarmer72.desc: Harvesting the products of clone farms is mostly done by the clones themselves -particularly to those whose sims tended towards the social. This clone was one such, who escaped from the farms and headed out to the stars.

ColiseumCleaner54.title: Pulitore dell'arena
ColiseumCleaner54.desc: Durante il fallout radioattivo della "Guerra Interna Destrian", i genitori di NAME vennero catturati e HE nacque come schiavo(a). Venne obbligato(a) a ripulire le arene dopo i sanguinosi combattimenti a pagamento. Osservo', aspetto' ed imparo'. L'arena era l'unica cosa che aveva mai conosciuto. Una notte, mentre puliva l'arena, la sua famiglia venne assassinata.

ColiseumFighter12.title: Gladiatore
ColiseumFighter12.desc: Mettendo in pratica le conoscenze che acquisi' negli anni trascorsi vicino ai combattenti, NAME divenne un gladiatore di successo nell'arena che un tempo HE puliva.

ColonialGovernor77.title: Governatore coloniale
ColonialGovernor77.desc: Disilluso dalla galoppante corruzione governativa, Henry si candido' come governatore e vinse. Tuttavia, le gang locali ed i loro funzionari corrotti lo costrinsero presto a rinunciare alla carica. Lui lascio' la comunita' per ritornare alla sua vita da maresciallo.

ColonyKid47.title: Colony kid
ColonyKid47.desc: NAME was born the child of two doctors in a small colony. Because of HIS parents, HE was always interested in science and medicine.\n\nNAME never really got along with other children, and as a result became withdrawn and unsociable.

ColonySettler53.title: Colono
ColonySettler53.desc: NAME era il colono di un nuovo mondo. Una tale vita richiede di essere un tuttofare per quanto riguarda i lavori di base.

ComaChild57.title: Bambino comatoso
ComaChild57.desc: Un incidente durante la sua infanzia fece cadere in coma NAME. HECAP non si e' risvegliato(a) fino al termine della sua adolescenza. Il suo corpo non si e' mai ripreso dagli anni di inattivita', ma le persone tendono a provare pieta' di HIM quando ascoltano la sua storia.

CombatEngineer30.title: Combat engineer
CombatEngineer30.desc: NAME became a combat engineer. HE built bases, fixed guns, and repaired vehicles for the army - when HE wasn't shooting at people, that is.

CombatMedic16.title: Combat medic
CombatMedic16.desc: After his home country entered a large-scale war, Felix was drafted into the army as a combat medic.\n\nHis few years in the trenches trying to keep his fellow soldiers alive gave him an acute sense for first aid. Losing many friend has made him stoic and reserved.

CombatMedtech20.title: Combat medtech
CombatMedtech20.desc: As a military medtech, NAME's job was to fix and build anything he could get HIS hands on, from living people to machines and mechs.\n\nSent into dangerous areas, HE never had a problem saving soldiers' lives and building the technology and machines needed to win.

CombatNegotiator47.title: Negoziatore di guerra
CombatNegotiator47.desc: Dopo essere fuggito dal proprio mondo, NAME ha portato le sue capacita' tra le stelle. Scelse di operare come mercenario, lavorando per varie organizzazioni ribelli, gruppi di schiavi ed enclavi mercantili. La sua specialita' era la negoziazione in situazioni di combattimento.

ComputerEngineer16.title: Computer engineer
ComputerEngineer16.desc: Bored of his code-monkey office job and missing the glory days of the Academy, NAME saw a commercial about the frontier where "only the strong survive".\n\nWith his wife Morgan, NAME undertook a journey into the unknown.

ConArtist80.title: Genio della truffa
ConArtist80.desc: NAME non ha mai creato nulla nella sua vita. HECAP, tuttavia, ha dimostrato di avere una tendenza naturale a fare in modo che siano gli altri a dare a HIM quello che hanno creato.

ConceptualArtist39.title: Artista concettuale
ConceptualArtist39.desc: NAME era celebre nei circoli artistici del suo mondo nativo per le sue creative realizzazioni concettuali. Nessuno sapeva esattamente quale messaggio HE cercava di far passare, ma le sue opere erano molto apprezzate dai collezionisti.

ConstructionEngineer94.title: Ingegnere edile
ConstructionEngineer94.desc: NAME era un lavoratore edile su un Mondo Medio. HECAP dirigeva una squadra che costruiva di tutto, dagli uffici alle cattedrali. Il suo lavoro frenetico ed i numerosi fast-food nelle vicinanze hanno fatto in modo che HE non abbia mai imparato a cucinare per se' stesso(a).

ConstructionGrunt79.title: Manovale ribelle
ConstructionGrunt79.desc: Cresciuto nel laboratorio di suo padre, Jackson ha avuto la vita di un intellettuale d'elite. Lui ha avuto tutto quello che desiderava, e il prezzo non era mai un problema. Nonostante tutto, Jackson non ha mai preso parte al lusso che gli veniva offerto. Al contrario, ha cercato lavori più manuali e - agli occhi di suo padre - di classe inferiore.

ConventChild16.title: Bambino di un convento
ConventChild16.desc: Risultato di una scappatella, NAME venne allevato(a) dalle suore in un monastero medievale. HECAP ha appreso il valore del duro lavoro e della sottomissione, ma gli(le) venne anche insegnato che la tecnologia era eretica.

CoreDilettante99.title: Dilettante della regione centrale
CoreDilettante99.desc: Candice ha trascorso i suoi anni di formazione su un mondo splendente della regione centrale, dove lei ed i suoi amici conducevano delle vite di ozioso piacere. Mentre cresceva, lei comincio' a trovare la vita di un'insoddisfacente comodita'. Decise di cercare una strada più stimolante.

CoreWorldJeweler59.title: Gioielliere di un Mondo Centrale
CoreWorldJeweler59.desc: Dopo che Alyssa completo' tutti i suoi interventi chirurgici, scopri' di avere molto tempo ed energie da dedicare alla sua passione: la creazione di gioielli. Ha trascorso gli anni a perfezionare la sua arte di gioielliere, poi ha lasciato il suo mondo natale per vendere i suoi prodotti per la galassia.

CoreWorldStudent4.title: Studente di un Mondo Centrale
CoreWorldStudent4.desc: Nato come un maschio di nome Alex, Alyssa non si trovava bene con gli altri ragazzi. Quando era molto giovane, allo sport preferiva passatempi creativi, come la creazione di gioielli. Sentiva di avere il corpo sbagliato. Fortunatamente, la sua famiglia ed i suoi amici sostennero il suo cambio di sesso; da adolescente, si sottopose ad un intervento chirurgico per diventare donna.

CorpBredStudent56.title: Corp-bred student
CorpBredStudent56.desc: NAME was bred to become an executive for the space exploration corporation that owned his home planet. HISCAP family had been working for that corporation for four generations.\n\nAt age five, HE enrolled at the corporate academy where he learned loyalty and ruthlessness. NAME excelled in finding diplomatic solutions where others would need violence.

CorporateBuilder58.title: Corporate builder
CorporateBuilder58.desc: Even as HE stewed in HIS own wasted potential, NAME found HE had a knack for moving objects quickly. It was just what the planetary mega-corps wanted in their construction divisions.\n\nUnfortunately, the monotonous work erased HIS remaining creative impulses.

CorpResearcher93.title: Corp researcher
CorpResearcher93.desc: NAME was sold to a corporation and put to work as a corporate slave doing scientific research.\n\nUnable to adapt to the social politics of his workplace, he buried himself in his work and failed to progress up the corporate ladder. Every day, he yearned to be left alone.

CorpStudent30.title: Studente della corporazione
CorpStudent30.desc: De Dion venne allevato per diventare un funzionario esecutivo per la grande corporazione commerciale spaziale che possedeva il suo pianeta. La sua famiglia aveva lavorato per quella corporazione per sette generazioni. All'eta' di sei anni, inizio' a studiare presso l'accademia della corporazione, dove imparo' a diventare un fedele gregario e un dirigente spietato.

CosmeticReject89.title: Cosmetic reject
CosmeticReject89.desc: Living on the streets, Chaz submitted himself to an unethical cosmetics lab in exchange for food and shelter.\n\nAfter some painful cosmetic modification, Chaz barely resembles his former self. Having been forced to work for the lab until he was rescued, Chaz is now too afraid to lash out at anyone.

CosmeticSurgeon36.title: Cosmetic surgeon
CosmeticSurgeon36.desc: NAME had a terrible bedside manner due to HIS abrasiveness. HECAP often bullied HIS patients into getting cosmetic surgery. HECAP made a lot of money this way.\n\nWhile very studious and careful in HIS work, HE never had to lift a finger doing domestic chores.

Counselor26.title: Consulente
Counselor26.desc: Un trauma terrificante subito quando era adolescente provoco' a NAME l'insorgenza di un grave disturbo alimentare. Grazie a dei consigli, HE imparo' ad avere un rapporto piu' salutare con il cibo e decise di mettere a disposizione la propria esperienza per aiutare gli altri a superare i loro problemi emotivi.

CountryChild95.title: Country child
CountryChild95.desc: NAME was raised up to fear God and love HIS country. HECAP was a genuine backwoods kid. HECAP always worked hard to earn respect rather than demanding it.

Courtesean30.title: Prostituta
Courtesean30.desc: Il corpo di NAME e' stato usato da centinaia di clienti nei bordelli di numerosi pianeti. HECAP ha sviluppato alcune virtu' mentali ed una certa abilita' nella vita di strada.

CowFarmer23.title: Cow farmer
CowFarmer23.desc: NAME grew up on a rim world, under the tyranny of HIS father, who forced HIM to work every day on the farm. HE dreamed of escaping HIS father and exploring the universe.\n\nOne day, when the trade ship was overhead, HE stowed away among the goods in the launch pods, and escaped into space.

CraftShaper62.title: Craft shaper
CraftShaper62.desc: NAME locked HIMself in his studio for years, ordering delivery food to save time on cooking.\n\nEventually, HIS creations brought HIM the highest honor on Semantic World: Permission to materialize any design in minutes using the most advanced technologies.

CrimeBossChild48.title: Crime boss' child
CrimeBossChild48.desc: NAME was adopted child of a notorious crime boss. HECAP was taught all facets of the family business, from smuggling to inventive ways of killing.\n\nWhen the family was attacked, HIS father ordered HIM to hide in a secret longsleep crypt.

CrimeLord56.title: Crime lord
CrimeLord56.desc: Through brutality and cruelty, NAME rose to the rank of crime lord.\n\nHe relied less on his fists and more on his guns. His reputation spread faster due to his cold-bloodedness and ruthless methods.

CriminalKingpin27.title: Criminal kingpin
CriminalKingpin27.desc: NAME discovered his gift - people did what he said, when he said it. Taking advantage of this, he set off for the rimworlds planets to make a name for himself in the criminal underworld.\n\nHaving people do things for him taught him to avoid manual labor at all costs.

CriminalSurgeon99.title: Criminal surgeon
CriminalSurgeon99.desc: Being near many injured fellow criminals, NAME took it upon HIMself to work on them.\n\nAlthough many people died, HE did get better at using knives.

CultChild3.title: Figlio di cultisti
CultChild3.desc: NAME nacque all'interno di un potente culto che evitava l'uso della tecnologia avanzata e credeva che tutti i mali potessero essere guariti purgando la propria anima con l'arte sacra. Dopo la prima occhiata al mondo esterno, NAME decise di fuggire.

DataDecoder39.title: Data decoder
DataDecoder39.desc: Born on a glitterworld, NAME was very interested in the process of documenting information, and quickly became senior glitterpedia recorder.\n\nHECAP was effective at self-study, but HE was lacked in social experiences.

DeepSpaceMiner3.title: Minatore dello spazio profondo
DeepSpaceMiner3.desc: NAME faceva il duro e sporco lavoro di estrarre metallo dagli asteroidi su una piattaforma spaziale. HECAP ha usato quotidianamente le sue pratiche abilita' industriali - e non se la cavava male nemmeno nelle risse da pub.

Defector78.title: Disertore
Defector78.desc: Appena raggiunta l'eta' adulta, NAME decise di fuggire dall'oppressiva dittatura in cui aveva vissuto. La sua deserzione non venne ben accolta e furono inviati degli agenti alle sue calcagna. HECAP ha trascorso gli anni a fuggire, curando da solo(a) le sue ferite così che nessun medico potesse tradirlo(a). Questa calvario ha reso NAME duro(a) e diffidente.

DefenseLawyer71.title: Defense lawyer
DefenseLawyer71.desc: NAME found that HE could make more money with a quick word than a blaster. Seeking a job where HIS silver tongue could be useful, HE turned to the law.\n\nHECAP often defended the illegal speeder racers HE grew up with.

DestroyerGeneral61.title: Destroyer-general
DestroyerGeneral61.desc: NAME held the rank of Destroyer-General in a powerful midworld military.\n\nHECAP was known for his mastery of weapons, and was also a good ship pilot.

Digger69.title: Scavatore
Digger69.desc: NAME e la sua tribu' hanno scavato la loro casa dentro il versante di una montagna. NAME si sente come a casa scavando nella roccia e puntellando le pareti della caverne.

DiplomatsChild97.title: Figlio di diplomatici
DiplomatsChild97.desc: NAME nacque in una famiglia di diplomatici. Viaggiando spesso, HE studio' come privatista e vide il mondo perlopiu' attraverso un computer.

DisasterSurvivor58.title: Disaster survivor
DisasterSurvivor58.desc: NAME's planet collided with a small moon. Everything he knew as home was destroyed, and his entire family died. HECAP was left in the ruins to fend for himself.

DiscardedYouth93.title: Discarded youth
DiscardedYouth93.desc: NAME grew up isolated on a trash planet. A dumping ground for surrounding glitterworlds, it was a harsh home. As a baby, HE sucked on the tap of a discarded nutrient paste dispenser for comfort.\n\nIn these desperate circumstances, against all odds, HE survived - and thrived.

DischargedSoldier56.title: Discharged soldier
DischargedSoldier56.desc: NAME prostituted himself to fund his drug habits. As an escape, HE joined the military and learned to fight.\n\nToo smart for the army, HE questioned and often disagreed with HIS superiors' decisions. This eventually led to HIS dishonorable discharge and left HIM with a chip on HIS shoulder.

DisciplinedFarmer44.title: Agricoltore disciplinato
DisciplinedFarmer44.desc: Drew era il piu' giovane di due figli in una famiglia di agricoltori di un avamposto di frontiera che faticava a portare profitti. Il padre di Drew aveva una rigorosa disciplina e costringeva i suoi figli a lavorare sodo e senza fiatare. Una volta Drew si brucio' la mano preparando la colazione e da quel momento giuro' che avrebbe cucinato solo se la sua vita fosse stata in pericolo.

DisplacedNoble83.title: Displaced noble
DisplacedNoble83.desc: Born on an urbworld to the ruler of three megacities, NAME�s prospects looked good - until a violent insurrection overthrew HIS family. Exile introduced NAME to hard work and combat, but some high-born squeamishness remains.

DoomsdayPariah24.title: Paria della fine del mondo
DoomsdayPariah24.desc: NAME riusci' ad aprire una cripta di una tecnologica ultraterrena durante gli scavi in un sito archeologico. Ha cosi' involontariamente innescato un dispositivo apocalittico che ripuli' il pianeta di ogni traccia di vita. Piu' interessato(a) alla tecnologia che alla vita umana, HE si imbarco' sulla nave spaziale della cripta ed e' partito(a) alla ricerca di altre reliquie di cui abusare.

DreadedBaby46.title: Dreaded baby
DreadedBaby46.desc: NAME was found as a baby in a crashed spacecraft. According to the ship's data records, HE invented the nuclear device that powered his ship. Apparently, he also invented the sky and the hamburger, and is said to have fathered a race of tasty golden kittens.

DreadedDude94.title: Dreaded dude
DreadedDude94.desc: Some followers say that NAME and HIS crew of misfits found the Fountain of Youth, many, many centuries ago, and that they caused the extinction of the dinosaurs on many planets.\n\nThere's even a religion about them, somewhere, involving noodles and meatballs.

Dreamer79.title: Dreamer
Dreamer79.desc: NAME was an expressive child. HECAP sang often, and made friends very easily, be they young or old, male or female.\n\nHECAP hated fighting, but when made angry, HE could be dangerous. HISCAP temper was quick.

Drifter67.title: Vagabondo
Drifter67.desc: NAME non ha mai veramente deciso cosa fare della sua vita. HECAP ha viaggiato spesso, facendo lavoretti quando li trovava. HECAP ha anche lavorato occasionalmente ad un romanzo che lui sa essere un bestseller - non appena riuscira' a trovare un editore che sia interessato.

DromedaryKnight32.title: Dromedary knight
DromedaryKnight32.desc: Having caught the eye of HIS people's Sand King, NAME was trained in the Sandy Boomrat fighting technique.\n\nAlways with a camel to carry his things, HE served HIS sand people faithfully.

Drudge59.title: Drudge
Drudge59.desc: NAME was never sure what HE wanted to do with HIS life. HECAP spent most of HIS time doing low-wage jobs and wondering what HIS future would be like.\n\nHECAP entertained himself with space sims and survival games, dreaming of one day being somewhere more interesting.

DrugLieutenant8.title: Drug lieutenant
DrugLieutenant8.desc: NAME worked the drug trade under kingpin Grady Loughman. He had his men sell drugs when it was profitable, and fight the other cartels when the government came around.\n\nHis social skills kept him on top of the political game, and he always had servants to cook and clean.

DrugMule94.title: Corriere della droga
DrugMule94.desc: Cresciuto in orfanotrofio, NAME entro' nel mondo delle gang a dieci anni. Venne usato dalla banda locale come corriere della droga per trasportare la "sostanza F" attraverso il territorio di una gang rivale. Si e' preso una o due pallottole.

DustyFarmHand75.title: Dusty farm hand
DustyFarmHand75.desc: From the time NAME could walk, HE helped take care of the animals and crops that HIS people tended in their arid homeland.\n\nThe work toughened HIM, but left little time for intellectual activities.

EarthColonist48.title: Earth colonist
EarthColonist48.desc: NAME was born on Earth. As a child, HECAP was launched into space as part of an interstellar colonization program.

EnergeticPopIdol4.title: Energetic pop idol
EnergeticPopIdol4.desc: Priscilla grew up on a glitterworld, training in rapier arts and singing. She spent several years as an energetic teen pop idol.\n\nHowever, she decided that the music and modeling industries were not paying her enough attention, so she left.

EnergyResearcher67.title: Energy researcher
EnergyResearcher67.desc: NAME was working on an idea for rapid communication over long distances. HECAP made an error which destroyed HIS lab and most of the city. HECAP fled the planet to escape the authorities.

Engineer47.title: Engineer
Engineer47.desc: NAME found a job as a tinkering engineer on the trading hub planet Irithir. Tough local traders forced him to learn negotiation skills, and he made good profits selling refurbished weapons and tools.

EngineeredPilot9.title: Pilota modificato
EngineeredPilot9.desc: Dopo che la sua provincia venne assediata da uno dei confinanti, NAME si offri' volontario per un generico programma di modificazione in grado di creare piloti per l'ultimo prototipo di caccia che lui aveva contribuito a progettare. Le modifiche gli permisero di pilotare la nave, ma ridussero anche la sua capacita' di concentrarsi sulle persone intorno a lui. A quel tempo, la gente lo chiamava "Scoiattolo".

EnvoyOfTheStars98.title: Envoy of the stars
EnvoyOfTheStars98.desc: NAME entered the diplomatic corps. Honor and tradition were the values he took with him on every mission.\n\nHISCAP prestigious position distanced him from backbreaking manual labor, allowing HIM to focus on his wordsmithing abilities. He left the blacksmithing to others.

EscapedConvict10.title: Detenuto evaso
EscapedConvict10.desc: NAME ha sempre negato qualsiasi coinvolgimento nei crimini che hanno portato alla sua incarcerazione in una brutale colonia penale. HECAP scappo' scavando un tunnel sotto il perimetro di sicurezza usando posate modificate.

Evangelist39.title: Evangelista
Evangelist39.desc: Il giorno del suo 21esimo compleanno, NAME ebbe una rivelazione religiosa. HECAP decise di trascorrere il resto della sua vita diffondendo la parola del suo dio, la bellezza della sua cultura e le sue inusuali tradizioni mediche.

ExecutiveOfficer30.title: Direttore esecutivo
ExecutiveOfficer30.desc: NAME era un direttore esecutivo di una grande corporazione commerciale spaziale. Dopo un fallito tentativo di manipolare la sua acesa ai vertici della societa', venne accusato dello stupro e dell'omicidio di un altro dirigente e della sua famiglia. Venne dichiarato colpevole. Tuttavia, grazie all'influenza della sua famiglia, venne esiliato anziche' essere condannato a morte.

ExiledPrince1.title: Exiled prince
ExiledPrince1.desc: A member of a royal family, NAME was exiled for shaming HIS family.\n\nLiving in a foreign land, mostly alone, HE spent most of HIS time making huts and houses to live in. HECAP found little time in an average day for enjoyment, and lost all his friends and family.

ExiledResearcher68.title: Exiled researcher
ExiledResearcher68.desc: NAME's love of robotics was not appreciated in her technophobic empire. The High Cardinal of the system excommunicated her, and she was never allowed to return.

ExoticChef96.title: Exotic chef
ExoticChef96.desc: NAME has always gone overboard when it comes to food. HECAP is always seeking new and exotic ingredients.\n\nHISCAP quest for ingredients has brought HIM into some close calls with local flora and fauna.

ExpertHandyman34.title: Expert handyman
ExpertHandyman34.desc: NAME worked as a traveling engineer. HECAP fixed things ranging from a simple communications array to the intricate software harness in his ship's AI meta-core. Nothing is beyond repair for HIM.

Explorer28.title: Explorer
Explorer28.desc: NAME traveled from planet to planet, gathering samples, stories, and research. He hoped one day to compile a record of every animal, plant, mineral, and machine and device in known space: The Complete Traveler's Guide to the RimWorlds.

ExplorerWriter10.title: Explorer-writer
ExplorerWriter10.desc: NAME traveled from planet to planet, gathering samples, stories, and research. \n\nHISCAP goal was to bring together enough knowledge to make a survival guide for future generations.

ExplosivesExpert26.title: Esperto di esplosivi
ExplosivesExpert26.desc: NAME era un geniere impiegato(a) nelle miniere. HECAP prese il suo lavoro molto seriamente e era molto portato(a) sugli aspetti tecnici - al punto che arrivo' a smettere di preoccuparsi di aiutare con la rimozione dei detriti una volta che la sua perfetta detonazione aveva fatto il suo lavoro.

FactionLeader74.title: Chef de bande
FactionLeader74.desc: Durant ses premi�res ann�es en tant adulte, l'entourage de NAME �tait essentiellement constitu� de groupes de d�linquants.\n\nPour s'amuser, HE les a regroup�s et emmen�s � une mort certaine. HECAP comprit qu'HE avait la capacit� de r�aliser ses ambitions de dirigeant(e).

FactoryWorker27.title: Operaio di una fabbrica
FactoryWorker27.desc: NAME faceva un lavoro umile e non qualificato in una fabbrica dell'era industriale. Il suo compito prevedeva anche di occuparsi dei muli e dei cavalli che trasportavano le merci per la citta'.

FactoryWorker58.title: Factory worker
FactoryWorker58.desc: Felix grew up in a large factory city on an industrial world.\n\nSince poverty was rampant and food scarce, he worked for whatever wages he could get. This wasn't an easy life, but Felix never shied away from a hard day's work.

FallenOfficial12.title: Fallen official
FallenOfficial12.desc: NAME was an official for an autocratic government.\n\nWhen HIS superiors demanded HE participate in atrocities, NAME resigned and escaped from HIS homeworld with nothing but the clothes on HIS back.

FallenProdigy79.title: Genio decaduto
FallenProdigy79.desc: NAME nacque in un mondo Mondo Splendente che precipito' nel caos. Suo padre mori' in combattimento. HECAP lotto' per ottenere una borsa di studio presso l'Accademia di Utmaior ed ha dovuto dimostrare di avere diritto di stare la'. Bambino(a) prodigio(a), HE era preso(a) di mira dai bulli per il suo caso pietoso e non riusciva a fare amicizia con gli altri ragazzi.

FarmBoy56.title: Ragazzo di campagna
FarmBoy56.desc: John ha lavorato nella sua fattoria di famiglia, occupandosi degli animali e curandoli quando erano feriti. Preferendo i compiti pratici e all'aperto, ha evitato i lavori poco impegnativi che lo avrebbero potuto tenutere al chiuso. Lui apprezzava questo lavoro solitario, ed aveva la tendenza a stare lontano dalle persone e ad occuparsi delle sue cose.

FarmerBoy63.title: Bambino della fattoria
FarmerBoy63.desc: I genitori di Benjamin morirono in un incendio quando aveva sette anni. Lui crebbe nella fattoria di suo zio, arando i campi e facendo lavori manuali. Lui non poteva sopportare di rispondere a domande sui suoi genitori morti, quindi ha rimpiazzato i contatti sociali con il duro lavoro.

FarmersSon51.title: Farmer's son
FarmersSon51.desc: Ade spent much of his childhood learning biome farming. In his biome they kept animals to investigate which would cope best in the alien environment.\n\nDue to this, the travel restrictions and oxygen rationing system, he rarely got to meet anyone from outside his family.

FarmHand30.title: Farm hand
FarmHand30.desc: NAME was born on a farm on a smaller colony world.\n\nEverything was taken care of by the few members of the farm, including NAME. This helped HIM build independence, spirit, and a well-rounded character.

FarmKid40.title: Bambino della fattoria
FarmKid40.desc: NAME crebbe nella fattoria di famiglia. HE amava lavorare i campi e prendersi cura degli animali.

FelineScientist97.title: Scienziato di felini
FelineScientist97.desc: NAME divenne uno scienziato rinomato nel campo dei felini. Volendo il meglio per i suoi animali e specializzandosi in allevamento selettivo, si mise in viaggio per cercare il posto di allevamento perfetto per i suoi gatti.

FeralChild63.title: Feral child
FeralChild63.desc: NAME and his family lived a hard but prosperous lives along with their fellow colonists on a distant rimworld.\n\nOne day a group of mechanoids attacked, killing everyone aside from Robert. He then lived alone in the desert until a group of raiders found him.

FerventResearcher44.title: Fervente ricercatrice
FerventResearcher44.desc: Da giovane, Holly era sicura che il suo pianeta ed il suo popolo erano ormai prossimi a raggiungere la trascendenza. La forte convinzione che la sua ricerca sarebbe stata la miccia che l'avrebbe portata a compiere atti sempre piu' pericolosi motivo' comitati burocratici e bioetici a collaborare per fermare i suoi progressi.

FeudalFarmBoy35.title: Feudal farm boy
FeudalFarmBoy35.desc: NAME was the son of a medieval farmer, and was expected to follow in his footsteps. He was brought up as a kind, well trained farm boy.\n\nHe lived in an unusual feudal kingdom which co-existed with a midworld society which was itself well-known for genetic manipulation.

FeudalLordling59.title: Feudal lordling
FeudalLordling59.desc: NAME grew up on a feudal world that was part of a multi-planet empire. As the son of a high lord, HE enjoyed many privileges.\n\nHECAP learned to maneuver in the both the political landscape and in close quarters combat.

FighterController64.title: Pilota di droni
FighterController64.desc: Durante la crisi di Zartha, Bashkire ha combattuto su molti mondi, fornendo supporto strategico tra terra e aria come pilota di droni. Durante la campagna vide amici feriti e uccisi sul campo. Questo trauma ha turbato i suoi sogni fino ad oggi, ma il suo scopo rimane chiaro.

FireKeeper22.title: Custode del fuoco
FireKeeper22.desc: NAME era responsabile di mantenere acceso il fuoco della tribu'. HECAP ha preso questa responsabilita' molto sul serio.

FireScarredChild32.title: Bambino ustionato
FireScarredChild32.desc: Duster era un bambino vivave che visse un'infanzia tranquilla finchè non fini' dentro un incendio riportando orrende ustioni alle mani e alle braccia. Sebbene le cicatrici si siano rimarginate, lui non sopporta di rimanere vicino al fuoco.

Flaneur69.title: Flaneur
Flaneur69.desc: NAME strolled and sipped his way through the streets and cafes of HIS world, pursuing freedom at every turn, never becoming attached.\n\nThrough all this time, HE remained distrustful of others. And never took an order from anyone.

FoundryApprentice76.title: Foundry apprentice
FoundryApprentice76.desc: NAME grew up as an apprentice in the foundries of an industrial world. This experience gave HIM metalworking skills and strong muscles, but stunted HIS artistic development.

FrightenedChild43.title: Bambino terrorizzato
FrightenedChild43.desc: NAME crebbe con un lungo elenco di fobie e nevrosi. Tra le altre cose, HE temeva particolarmente i medici e gli agenti patogeni provenienti dal cibo. Il risultato fu che HE imparo' a cucinare ed a curarsi autonomamente, sebbene molte delle sue paure lo(a) seguirono anche da adulto(a).

FrontierMarshal0.title: Frontier marshal
FrontierMarshal0.desc: Nate was the marshal of his colony. He tried to honorably uphold the law, but the corrupt local mayor killed his family and left him for dead.\n\nAfter regaining his health, Nate arrested the mayor. HECAP left his homeworld and started a new life working to make a difference in the universe.

GalacticPage22.title: Galactic page
GalacticPage22.desc: NAME served the high admiral of a space fleet. HECAP learned the ways of court, including etiquette and speechcraft.\n\nIn his feudal society, it was considered a great honor to serve a man of such prestige.

GameDeveloper95.title: Game developer
GameDeveloper95.desc: NAME was an independent game developer.\n\nAfter an early success, NAME's career quickly degenerated into a circus of misguided ideas, deals gone wrong, and desperate, failed PR stunts.

GameFanatic86.title: Game fanatic
GameFanatic86.desc: NAME was a fanatical gamer who learned to survive in virtual reality games.\n\nOnce, while attempting to prove HIS skills in the real world, HE was abducted by a criminal scientist and experimented on. HECAP escaped, but the experience stayed with him.

GangBoss32.title: Gang boss
GangBoss32.desc: To survive, NAME's gang often had to rob interstellar traders for food and supplies. Sometimes he had to kill the guards. Sometimes he had to kill the police who arrived to stop him.\n\nAfter years of this, he became one of the most-wanted criminals in the local stellar empire.

GangMember68.title: Gang member
GangMember68.desc: NAME grew up without parents. HISCAP whole life was spent alone, fighting for survival on the streets.\n\nNo matter how hard it became to survive, he never gave up.

GangSoldier39.title: Gang soldier
GangSoldier39.desc: Living for many years between three raider settlements, NAME persevered through many challenges: a spacecraft implosion, cryptostasis, crashlanding on a miserable dustball of a planet, and nursing an old man back to health, and many of battles.\n\nHECAP eventually took control of a violent gang.

Gardener31.title: Giardiniere
Gardener31.desc: Nei mondi industrializzati, la ricchezza si concentra nelle mani di coloro che possiedono fabbriche e vendono i loro prodotti. NAME lavorava presso la residenza di una di queste ricche famiglie, prendendosi cura dei lussureggianti giardini come parte di una squadra di servitori.

Gatherer40.title: Raccoglitore
Gatherer40.desc: NAME e' un maestro raccoglitore. HECAP puo' trovare cibo nei luoghi piu' sterili usando la sua profonda conoscenza su piante, radici e bacche.

GeneticEngineer31.title: Ingegnere genetico
GeneticEngineer31.desc: NAME effettuo' il suo primo esperimento genetico su animali da fattoria. HECAP divenne presto molto abile in tutte le forme di ingegneria genetica. Un terribile incidente di laboratorio lo lascio' con una paura mortale dei roditori.

GeneticScientist4.title: Studioso di genetica
GeneticScientist4.desc: Dopo la guerra entro' a far parte di una societa' di ingegneria genetica. Lui ha lavorato su miglioramenti per uomini ed animali. Le sue esperienze nell'infliggere e curare ferite furono molto utili per il suo lavoro, ma ha sviluppato un certo cinismo. Cio' ha reso difficili le interazioni sociali.

Geologist66.title: Geologo
Geologist66.desc: NAME ha lavorato con i minatori e gli scavatori di gallerie, identificando i tipi di rocce e le formazioni geologiche naturali. Durante gli anni trascorsi sotto terra HE ha anche acquisito esperienza nel riparare trivelle ed altre attrezzature tecniche.

GlitterworldEmpath26.title: Empate del Mondo Splendente
GlitterworldEmpath26.desc: NAME ha sempre avuto una straordinaria abilita' a relazionarsi con gli altri e ad appianare i conflitti. HECAP venne quindi scelto(a) per essere addestrato(a) come empate. Questo addestramento ha intensificato le sue abilita' naturali, ma HE e' diventato(a) incapace di fare del male a qualcuno.

GlitterworldKid13.title: Glitterworld kid
GlitterworldKid13.desc: The son of a genetically-engineered "perfect mate" on a glitterworld, Chaz was much more shy, withdrawn and nervous than his parents. HECAP kept mostly to himself, studying science and medicine and taking on gardening as a hobby. \n\nIn HIS teens, HE ran away from home, seeking a quieter life.

GlitterworldNerd40.title: Glitterworld nerd
GlitterworldNerd40.desc: NAME loved technology from the day HE was born. HECAP had a mechanoid companion which HE tried to modify when HE was 10.\n\nHISCAP obsession with technology meant that HE never appreciated arts or culture.

GlitterworldOfficer60.title: Ufficiale di un Mondo Splendente
GlitterworldOfficer60.desc: Sebbene i Mondi Splendenti siano luoghi pacifici, spesso restano preparati alla guerra. L'unita' di NAME vide raramente una vera azione. Nonostante HE coltivasse i suoi passatempi artistici, i suoi subordinati preferivano distrarsi con le risse, perciò NAME divenne abile ad appianare i conflitti.

GlitterworldRoyal21.title: Glitterworld royal
GlitterworldRoyal21.desc: NAME grew up in a glitterworld royal household. She was groomed from a young age to marry into another planet's royal family.\n\nUnfortunately, her crooked teeth made her undesirable to suitors, so she became bitter and resentful.

GlitterworldSurgeon15.title: Chirurgo del Mondo Splendente
GlitterworldSurgeon15.desc: NAME ha lavorato come chirurgo in un mondo praticamente privo di ogni forma di malattia e sofferenza umana. Il suo lavoro riguardava principalmente l'elaborazione e la realizzazione di chirurgia plastica. HECAP ha una buona conoscenza della biologia umana, ma non ha mai dovuto rimuovere un tumore - o una pallottola.

Gnomebiologist56.title: Gnomebiologist
Gnomebiologist56.desc: Gizmo was a xenobiology professor in a glitterworld university. He went to conferences and managed an art gallery.\n\nHowever, he never stopped sculpting yard gnomes, and considers this to be his true profession.

GNomeSculptor7.title: G-nome sculptor
GNomeSculptor7.desc: NAME was engineered in a lab as part of the G-nome Project. He was implanted at birth with encyclopedic knowledge of all aspects of xenobiology.\n\nThe G-nome scientists nicknamed him Gizmo and occupied him with sculpting. He developed a love of sculpting gnomes and gnome accessories.

GovernmentAgent47.title: Government agent
GovernmentAgent47.desc: NAME worked for the government against rebel groups and excelled in this capacity. During HIS training HE was taught firearms, melee combat and medical skills.\n\nHaving grown up in a war-ravaged city, dirt, blood and dead bodies don�t bother HIM and HE sees no reason to clean them up.

GraphicDesigner99.title: Designer di grafica
GraphicDesigner99.desc: L'interesse di Kees per l'espressione artistica l'ha portato a diventare un designer. Il suo occhio per i dettagli lo ha reso un'artista ben noto sul suo pianeta, sebbene la sua meticolosita' l'ha portato spesso a spendere troppo tempo per perfezionare un progetto alla volta.

GunKid55.title: Gun kid
GunKid55.desc: Growing up in a urbworld, NAME never had it easy. Every day was a struggle and pollution, hunger, and gangs of older kids.\n\nIn the little space he had to himself, he studied his passion - guns, combat tactics, and war history.

HackerKid55.title: Hacker kid
HackerKid55.desc: Born on a high-tech world, NAME learned hack computers at a young age. \n\nSpending many hours tinkering alone made HIM very good with machines, but very bad with humans.

HackerProdigy70.title: Genio hacker
HackerProdigy70.desc: Wedge e' stato allevato come figlio unico di ricchi chirurghi. Dopo essere stato costretto ad accettare un apprendistato medico, e' scoppiato. Si e' impadronito della sua eredita' ed e' andato in un sotterraneo per imparare come violare le reti di computer. Divenne presto uno dei piu' temibili hacker del suo pianeta natale.

HeadjackAddict4.title: Headjack addict
HeadjackAddict4.desc: Plugged in to the computer via head-jack for days at a time, NAME found HE preferred the company of computers to that of people or pets.

Healer0.title: Healer
Healer0.desc: NAME took the time to admire the beauty of the world.\n\nHer passive aggressiveness surfaced once in a while, but she tried to adapt to her changing life.

HedgeFundManager85.title: Hedge fund manager
HedgeFundManager85.desc: A top hedge fund manager on a teeming urbworld, NAME's portfolio grew rapidly as he charmed clients with a sweet voice and devious intent. When the deal turned out too good to be true, he was forced to flee the planet with a bounty on his head.\n\nAs he travelled the stars he found a passion in the arts, making masterpieces fit for high society customers.

Herbalist54.title: Erborista
Herbalist54.desc: NAME ha vissuto in una foresta vicino ad un villaggio. Sebbene temuto(a) da molti degli abitanti del villaggio, quelli malati andavano comunque da HIM per comprare balsami ed impacchi creati con le erbe che HE faceva crescere nel suo giardino. HECAP era felice di aiutarli - per un certo prezzo.

Herder58.title: Pastore
Herder58.desc: Da piccolo(a), NAME si occupava delle greggi di muffalo della tribu', tenendole al sicuro dai predatori e curando le malattie. Era un lavoro tranquillo, ma HE apprezzava di stare lontano dalle persone.

Hermit12.title: Eremita
Hermit12.desc: Esaurito(a) dalle pressioni delle interazioni sociali, NAME ha lasciato la sua affollata citta' del Mondo Medio per vivere una vita semplice nella natura. Qui, HE ha trascorso i suoi giorni in solitudine, prendendosi cura del suo giardino e creando gli strumenti semplici di cui aveva bisogno per sopravvivere.

HexCellArtist91.title: Hex-cell artist
HexCellArtist91.desc: NAME crafted sculptures from spent hex-cells and traded them to a local museum for food.\n\nAfter HIS popularity grew, HE was approached by a pirate and abducted. The pirate kept HIM prisoner and forced HIM to create sculptures for sale.

HighBaroness29.title: High baroness
HighBaroness29.desc: NAME was born as low-ranking royalty in a large imperial family.\n\nShe was placed In charge of running her home planet from an early age, and learned important political and cultural skills in that role.

HillbillyProdigy85.title: Bifolco prodigio
HillbillyProdigy85.desc: Nato su un freddo pianeta montano abitato principalmente da pelosi xenoumani, Benjamin e' cresciuto al suono di risse da bar e sparatorie. Benche' trascorse la sua infanzia a suonare il banjo ed a lavorare come meccanico, la sua straordinaria intelligenza gli permise di aspirare a qualcosa di piu'; venne ammesso alla scuola di medicina all'eta' di vent'anni.

HiredAssassin2.title: Hired assassin
HiredAssassin2.desc: Axle was a master thief, working mostly for organized crime. Over time, he made a name for himself and shifted his business into the paid "removal" of human threats.

HiredGun28.title: Hired gun
HiredGun28.desc: NAME always wanted to prove HE could make a living without HIS parents' help. HECAP did shady jobs that often involved pointing guns at innocent people.\n\nHe eventually made enough money to board a cheap freighter. He discovered why it was so cheap when it crashed.

HistoryStudent78.title: Studente di storia
HistoryStudent78.desc: Da bambino(a), NAME ha trascorso il tempo ad imparare molte forme d'arte, incluse musica e scrittura. Mentre cresceva, comincio' a studiare le leggende del suo mondo di origine - leggende su esseri lucertola centrali nel folklore della sua cultura.

HiveWorldChild2.title: Bambino di un alveare
HiveWorldChild2.desc: NAME ebbe un'educazione isolata in una ecumenopoli alveare. Il suo odio per le altezze lo costrinse spesso al chiuso, e fece di lui un bambino introverso. Quando usciva sulle passerelle della citta', si divertiva a fare giochi di guerra, diventando competente con varie armi giocattolo.

HiveworldDrone0.title: Drone di un mondo alveare
HiveworldDrone0.desc: NAME ha lavorato come drone da costruzione senza cervello in una immensa civilta' di un mondo alveare. Anche se HE e' ora libero(a) dai brutali esperimenti sociali a cui venne sottoposto(a), resta ancora incapace di un pensiero o iniziativa creativa.

Housemate8.title: Casalinga
Housemate8.desc: Da grande, NAME si occupava della casa e curava i bambini mentre il suo coniuge lavorava.

HouseServant35.title: Domestico
HouseServant35.desc: Appena raggiunta l'eta' adulta, NAME venne rapito(a) e venduto(a) come domestico(a) a dei ricchi aristocratici. HECAP ha imparato a conoscere bene le cucine e le cantine della casa dei suoi padroni, ma non ha mai fatto nessun lavoro all'esterno.

HumanComputer7.title: Computer umano
HumanComputer7.desc: NAME dimostro' di avere una memoria eccellente ed un dono per risolvere mentalmente calcoli complessi. Il dittatore di un Mondo Medio decise di utilizzarlo per tenere traccia delle sue finanze e spese, dal momento che i computer elettrici erano troppo facili da hackerare.

HumanTrafficker61.title: Human trafficker
HumanTrafficker61.desc: NAME stole children from their homes to sell them to interested buyers.\n\nOver time, he lost what little moral sense he had left.

Hunter7.title: Hunter
Hunter7.desc: Hawke was a master hunter.\n\nHe learned to track and trap any animal in the most dangerous of places, and had deep knowledge of many ingenious methods for taking down specific large animals.

HunterOfTheKing18.title: Hunter of the king
HunterOfTheKing18.desc: NAME was forced to protect his colony in the name of the king after a mysterious outbreak of murderous genetically-modified wildlife.\n\nDespite his best efforts, his kingdom was destroyed. NAME developed PTSD, a hatred of animals and a bad case of technophobia. HECAP was named for the place they found him.

IcePlanetChild60.title: Ice planet child
IcePlanetChild60.desc: Growing up on the frozen wastes of an ocean moon, NAME only had animals and a few hard-bitten sailors as companions.\n\nThe lack of social interaction made him develop a interest in engineering - but he never developed any great fondness for humans.

IceworldSurvivor75.title: Uomo glaciale
IceworldSurvivor75.desc: Nato tra i ghiacci, ha imparato a sopravvivere grazie al lavoro di gruppo costruendo col nulla. NAME si è abituato al freddo, ma non a curarsi di quelle strane cose verdi chiamate piante.

IdealisticCadet31.title: Idealistic cadet
IdealisticCadet31.desc: Raised in the military traditions of his forefathers, NAME was taught from a young age that he would be a great leader and the hero of the Dichter family.\n\nHe excelled at his studies and graduated from the academy with honors.

IllegalShipwright76.title: Carpentiere fuorilegge
IllegalShipwright76.desc: Esiste una legge che dice che non e' consentito mettere ingrassatori di dimensione terawatt a bordo di una nave da carico. Soprattutto se camuffati da parabole di comunicazione per un miglior potenziale di agguato. Tuttavia, NAME ha scoperto che ci si possono fare molti soldi, con coloro che non sono interessati a queste leggi.

ImperialGeneral5.title: Imperial general
ImperialGeneral5.desc: NAME's thirst for power defined HIM. HECAP quickly rose through the military ranks and soon attained the rank of general.\n\nHECAP was given with the most challenging task - conquering distant and unexplored rim worlds. Victory here could even position HIM as a successor to the emperor.

ImperialStudent49.title: Imperial student
ImperialStudent49.desc: NAME studied on an imperial midworld where guns were banned and self-defense study was encouraged. The relative safety allowed HIM to focus on HIS botanical research.

IndustrialOrphan13.title: Orfano industriale
IndustrialOrphan13.desc: NAME non ha mai conosciuto i suoi genitori. I suoi ricordi piu' erano le fatiche nelle miniere e nei magazzini del suo mondo industriale. A causa di cio', HE non ha mai ricevuto un'educazione adeguata.

IndworldUrchin73.title: Monello di strada
IndworldUrchin73.desc: NAME e' cresciuto(a) nelle strade di un mondo alle prime fasi della sua rivoluzione industriale. HECAP ha trascorso le sue giornate a rubare, elemosinare e smanettare con i resti di macchine abbandonate, sempre alla ricerca di un modo per sfuggire alla poverta'.

Infantry36.title: Soldato
Infantry36.desc: NAME crebbe in un mondo devastato dalla guerra. Ha, fin da subito, imparato a esprimere la sua volontà con l'uso della forza e delle armi. E' not{PAWN_gender ? o:a} per l'entusiasmo con cui può commettere le peggiori atrocità.

InformationBroker77.title: Venditore di informazioni
InformationBroker77.desc: NAME prese una nave per il primo sistema solare ed inizio' una vita di viaggi e studi, raccogliendo rapidamente una grande quantita' di conoscenze da persone di ogni genere o razza. HECAP ha imparato a vendere questa conoscenza per trarne profitto e divenne un influente venditore di informazioni.

IntelligenceAgent4.title: Agente di intelligence
IntelligenceAgent4.desc: Grazie alle sue abilita' di hackeraggio, Wedge venne reclutato dal corpo governativo del suo pianeta natale per lavorare come agente di intelligence. Il governo lo addestro' al combattimento, ma lui preferisce la guerra psicologica. Le regole governative si rivelarono troppo rigide per lui, quindi e' diventato un criminale. Le sue attuali attivita' sono sconosciute.

Inventor6.title: Inventore
Inventor6.desc: Sul suo mondo natale, NAME era un inventore di discreto successo. HECAP ha sviluppato diverse tecnologie minori.

InvoluntaryHermit32.title: Eremita involontario
InvoluntaryHermit32.desc: La capsula di salvataggio di NAME venne lanciata su una regione inesplorata di un mondo di frontiera. Lei trascorse un'esistenza solitaria con l'unica compagnia di una mandria di muffalo. In seguito, e' stata vista vestirsi di pellicce di vombati pigmei, intenta a discutere dell'importanza dell'igiene degli zoccoli con un gruppo di muffalo adulti.

Jailbird40.title: Carcerato
Jailbird40.desc: NAME ha trascorso la maggior parte della sua vita in prigione, dove venne messo(a) a lavorare nelle cucine. HECAP aveva l'abitudine di fare a botte ed ha maturato un modo di parlare aggressivo.

JoywireAddict76.title: Joywire addict
JoywireAddict76.desc: NAME's wealthy parents provided everything HE ever wanted. After discovering joywires, HE became obsessed. Once HIS parents realized what happened, they cut HIM off.\n\nUncaring and often violent, HE sought HIS next joywire fix by any means possible.

JoywireArtist8.title: Sviluppatore di impianti rasserenatori
JoywireArtist8.desc: NAME ha lavorato in un laboratorio di una ecumenopoli, sviluppando impianti rasserenatori all'avanguardia che massimizzavano il piacere dei propri utenti. Quando il governo locale impose severe restrizioni alla fabbricazione di questo tipo di impianti, HE ha iniziato a vendere i propri prodotti sul mercato nero.

KidScientist28.title: Kid scientist
KidScientist28.desc: Born into an influential family, NAME received the best education money could buy. Her intellect soon proved to be superior to many. However, her lack of empathy quickly put her at odds with her teachers and her parents.

Killer2.title: Killer
Killer2.desc: NAME was a bloodlusting child. Villagers thought her the product of a snake demon and human coupling.\n\nAfter watching how her human father betrayed and murdered her mother, she longed to see how many more humans she could get to fall into her hands.

LabGrownChild25.title: Lab-grown child
LabGrownChild25.desc: NAME was born in a laboratory as part of a altruistic but failed attempt to create a new class of human.\n\nHISCAP childhood was filled with books and one-on-one tutoring. He was awkward, shy, and naive to the true nature of humanity.

LaborCampOrphan63.title: Labor camp orphan
LaborCampOrphan63.desc: NAME lost her parents in an industrial accident and grew up in an orphans' labor camp. The camp overseers worked their charges mercilessly - but at least she was clothed and fed.

LazyProgrammer3.title: Programmatore pigro
LazyProgrammer3.desc: NAME sviluppo' indipendentemente un software che dava un vantaggio competitivo contro le locali corporazioni dell'ecumenopoli. I suoi metodi di dubbia legalita' portarono ad un crescente numero di reclami irrisolti riguardanti il furto di proprieta' intelletuale.

Loner40.title: Solitario
Loner40.desc: NAME non ha mai amato molto i consigli tribali o le festivita' annuali. HECAP preferisce le vaste pianure ed il solitario suono del vento tra le rocce. HECAP visita la sua tribu' di tanto in tanto, ma preferisce principalmente arrangiarsi da solo(a) impiegando le proprie capacita' di sopravvivenza.

LoneTraveler95.title: Lone traveler
LoneTraveler95.desc: After escaping HIS homeworld on a jury-rigged ship, NAME traveled to new worlds to experience their beauty.\n\nHECAP joined resistance groups and applied the skills HE cultivated on HIS homeworld. HECAP often warned of the nuclear horror HE saw as a child.

LoreKeeper51.title: Custode delle tradizioni
LoreKeeper51.desc: NAME era il(la) discendente di una lunga stirpe di guardiani delle tradizioni nella sua tribu'. Ogni notte attorno al fuoco, HECAP tramandava con le sue storie conoscenze ancestrali ed utili consigli.

LostMarine20.title: Lost marine
LostMarine20.desc: Shortly after being promoted to a respected position in his planet's military, NAME disappeared without a trace.\n\nLater, he reappeared at the head of his own military force. No one knows why he became who he was.

LowWageWorker7.title: Lavoratore sottopagato
LowWageWorker7.desc: NAME ha fatto svariati lavoretti per aiutare la sua famiglia, acquisendo una serie di competenze pratiche di base.

LudditeRebel43.title: Ribelle luddista
LudditeRebel43.desc: Quando la maggior parte delle persone del suo mondo scelse di abbandonare la propria individualita' ed umanita' biologica per riunirsi in una coscienza digitale collettiva, NAME si uni' ad una fazione ribelle che aveva scelto di abbandonare la maggior parte delle tecnologie.

MachineCollector55.title: Collezionista di macchine
